title: The problem with Firewall.
body:
Hi guys ..
After a long time I wanted to play LoL and when I turned on my jumps and table and it was written : Could not connect to the HTTP server.Please check that your internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking acces . And how it does it every time I want to turn..

If anyone knows what to do and advised it would be nice.:)

replies.body: This error may be a little misleading, depending on where it happened.  If this is happening when you are trying to get into the client, then you may be having a security setting issue preventing it from launching.  Go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!
